snippet.title: Berserk B.I.T.S - Official Release Window Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Meet your battle buddies, see customization options, and what you can expect from Berserk B.I.T.S in this trailer for this upcoming idle-RPG, auto-battler, and chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop, inspired by V-pets and other handheld battler devices. Let your B.I.T do battle and collect items while you relax or work on other tasks! Berserk B.I.T.S will be available on PC in Q4 2025.
